Package jetbrains.mps.nodeEditor.checking

Class BaseEventProcessingEditorChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • jetbrains.mps.nodeEditor.checking.BaseEditorChecker
      • jetbrains.mps.nodeEditor.checking.BaseEventProcessingEditorChecker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EditorChecker, EditorMessageOwner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutoResolver
    public abstract class BaseEventProcessingEditorChecker
extends BaseEditorChecker
    A base class for checkers that need to update themselves when a certain model event occurs. Keeps a single internal flag indicating the need to update.

    • Method Detail

      • processEvents

        public void processEvents​(List<jetbrains.mps.smodel.event.SModelEvent> events)
        Description copied from interface: EditorChecker
        Invalidates internal state for editors affected by events. Called outside a read/write action and implementors are discouraged from starting their own read/write action to do any model traversals because events are delivered asynchronously in batches and the current model state may not correspond to the events.
        Specified by:
        processEvents in interface EditorChecker
        Overrides:
        processEvents in class BaseEditorChecker
        Parameters:
        events - events that occurred since the last call to this method (or since this instance was added to the highlighter)

      • doneUpdating

        public void doneUpdating()
        Description copied from interface: EditorChecker
        Invoked after calling EditorChecker.update(jetbrains.mps.nodeEditor.EditorComponent, boolean, boolean, jetbrains.mps.util.Cancellable) on all needed editor components. Checkers that maintain one global "dirty" flag can mark themselves clean in this method.
        Specified by:
        doneUpdating in interface EditorChecker
        Overrides:
        doneUpdating in class BaseEditorChecker

        Specified by:

        Specified by:
